content:
Paste into your browser: https://plan-net-client.herokuapp.com/
In the server field, paste: https://davinci-plan-net-ri.logicahealth.org/fhir/. and hit Lookup

Alternatively, you could use the IBM, Helios servers (open access), or the Intersystems server (basic auth).

Saul Kravitz said:

Paste into your browser: https://plan-net-client.herokuapp.com/
In the server field, paste: https://davinci-plan-net-ri.logicahealth.org/fhir/. and hit Lookup

Alternatively, you could use the IBM, Helios servers (open access), or the Intersystems server (basic auth).

Saul,
Those links are not working. Do you have the updated server link details for Pharmacy network?

Hi @Bapi Behera Sorry about that. The server is up, but the client is not. It is on our near term todo list to get the deployed client back in working order.

@Dave Hill
Thanks Saul. Appreciate your focus on the issue.
In the mean time, you can install the client locally. See https://github.com/HL7-DaVinci/plan-net_client
